name: Faceplant Asteroids
description:
In this game, you are two astronaut smugglers on a spaceship who must exchange goods with clients in dangerous areas to avoid the authorities. Your objective is to survive until your client arrives!

Player 1 can move with WASD and interact with E.

Player 2 can move with Arrow Keys and interact with the Period key.

Player 1 Player 2 Walk  Jump Interact / Pickup & Drop Close Hint

Keyboard prompts provided by 'thoseawesomeguys'

This game was made by Benedikt Aron Sigurþórsson, Birkir Finnbogi H Arndal, Antonio Kristófer Salvador, and Einar Már Eggertsson in 2 weeks for Reykjavík University's Computer Game Design & Development course of 2021, taught by Steingerður Lóa Gunnarsdóttir and Hallgrímur Snær Andrésson.
